dcterms:creator: Y. Zhou
H. Wang
F. Xu
Y. Jin
dcterms:description: An L-band, full polarimetric image of San Francisco, widely used in literature. The image size is 900×1024 with a spatial resolution of 0.6m×1.6m. Each pixel can be classified into five categories: mountain, ocean, urban, vegetation, and bare soil.
dcterms:title: AIRSAR San Francisco

dcterms:creator: W. Wu
H. Li
L. Zhang
X. Li
H. Guo
dcterms:description: An L-band, full polarimetric image of the agricultural region of the Netherlands, with a size of 750 × 1024 and a spatial resolution of 0.6m × 1.6m. It includes 15 types of ground objects such as buildings, stembeans, rapeseed, and others.
dcterms:title: AIRSAR Flevoland

dcterms:creator: X. Liu
L. Jiao
X. Tang
Q. Sun
D. Zhang
dcterms:description: An L-band, full polarimetric image of Oberpfaffenhofen, Germany, with a scene size of 1200×1300. Each pixel is categorized into three classes: built-up areas, woodland, and open areas.
dcterms:title: ESAR Oberpfaffenhofen
